FAQ / Wave 5 / Battle Cards /
View On Teletraan1.net

Ghost Shield

  1. If an effect puts an Armor directly onto the battlefield without playing it, can I put Ghost Shield on a character that didn't have an Armor? [Source: WotC]
    Yes. As long as you're not playing Ghost Shield, its first ability won't apply.
  2. If one of my characters has a Weapon or Utility in its Armor slot (e.g. Energon Mace), can I play Ghost Shield to upgrade that character? [Source: WotC]
    No. In order to play Ghost Shield, it must replace an Armor in that slot.
